Castlevania.Lords.of.Shadow.2.Update1.incl.DLC-CODEX

CODEX PRESENTS:

Castlevania Lords of Shadow 2 Update 1 and DLC

        Release Date :  3/2014                Protection : -
        Discs        :  1                     Genre      : Action

      
Update 1 changelog :

        - fix save game problems
        - fix issues with ATI graphic cards
        - prepare for DLC content

        The following DLC's are included :

        - Revelations DLC (play as Alucard)
        - Relic Rune Pack
        - Dark Dracula Costume
        - Armored Dracula Costume

Installation: 
        
          - Extract
          - Burn or mount the .iso
          - Run setup and install the Update/DLC overwriting when
            asked
          - Play

          This Update and DLC Pack requires the main game released
          by RELOADED!
